Class ClientPoliciesUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.keycloak.services.clientpolicy.ClientPoliciesUtil

extends Object
    Utilities for treating client policies/profiles
    Author:
    Takashi Norimatsu

        public static ClientProfilesRepresentation getValidatedBuiltinClientProfilesRepresentation(KeycloakSession session,
                                                                                           InputStream is)
                                                                                    throws ClientPolicyException
        get validated and modified builtin client profiles set on keycloak app as representation. it is loaded from json file enclosed in keycloak's binary. not return null.
        Throws:
        ClientPolicyException

      • getValidatedClientProfilesJson

        public static String getValidatedClientProfilesJson(KeycloakSession session,
                                                    RealmModel realm,
                                                    ClientProfilesRepresentation proposedProfilesRep)
                                             throws ClientPolicyException
        get validated and modified client profiles as json. it can be constructed by merging proposed client profiles with existing client profiles. can return null.
        Throws:
        ClientPolicyException

                                                                             throws ClientPolicyException
